sourcesContent:
const BookDetails = (book) => { return (

{book.book.title}

{book.book.status}

Description

{book.book.description}

{book.book.parts != 0 ? "Parts / Volumes" : "Chapters"}

{book.book.parts === 0 ? book.book.chapters : book.book.parts}

Last Update

{book.book.lastUpdate}

{book.book.author}
My Components

{book.book.myComment}

alternativeNames

{book.book.alternativeNames}

tags

{book.book.tags}

category

{book.book.category}

) } export default BookDetails
